QuestData.Title: The Great Ezra Grimm
QuestData.Description: Men as far as Kul Tiras spoke of the legendary Ezra Grimm's premium tobacco. It was a delicacy enjoyed by every single person of importance that visited Stratholme. King Terenas, Uther the Lightbringer, Highlord Fordring...yes, they all enjoyed Grimm's specialty.$B$BSadly, Ezra stayed in his shop when Stratholme was invaded, swearing on his life that the Scourge would never touch his tobacco. Venture forth and see if even one bit remains here...it is worth its weight in gold, I assure you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover a box of Ezra Grimm's Premium Tobacco.
QuestData.RewardText: Truly, you have uncovered the snuff of legends. It is nearly impossible to place a value on this historical tobacco.$b$bHere, have a few coins.
